name: Rise From Hell (Geekosaurus)
description:
Jump and shoot to escape from the hell !

/ ! \ This game was made for AZERTYKeyboard, if you are using QWERTY, please press Alt+Shift for switching on AZERTY / ! \

Controls : 
- Q and D for moving 
- Space for Jumping
- Left Mouse Button for shooting
- Esc for exit game

This game was made for the Potat0s Game Jam #4

Assets used
Name : A* Pathfinding Free Version : 
Author : Aron Granberg
Source : https://arongranberg.com/unity/pathfinding/
Download : https://arongranberg.com/unity/pathfinding/

Sound used
Title:  Les quatre saisons - Eté (Vivaldi)
Author: Daniel Bautista
Source: https://www.danielbautista.com
Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/es/
Download: https://auboutdufil.com/?id=236
